Tropical Tastes
Gourmet
Beachfront Dining
ONE OF THE BEST PLACES TO TASTE.. ANYTHING
TASTEFUL EXPERIENCES
No matter what the occasion, Casa Ybel’s selection of casual & elegant dining venues will delight your taste buds while impressing your sense of style and leisure.  Our award-winning food and beverage team present a range of wondrous culinary experiences that are certain to titillate the most discerning and learned palates.
The award winning Thistle Lodge serves up a delightful Floridian and European culinary experience on par with the distinguished elegance that only Casa Ybel Resort’s unparalleled culinary team can offer.  Enjoy the award-winning gastronomic masterpieces in Sanibel’s most historic upscale restaurant that once played host to Thomas Edison and Henry Ford.
Brunch
Mothers Day Brunch + Dinner
Lunch
Dinner
Coconuts Poolside Bar & Grill
Wine List
Easter Brunch
Thanksgiving Day
Christmas Day
New Year's Eve
Coconuts Poolside Bar & Grill
Beachside Drinks & Fare
Located between the jade colored waters of the Gulf of Mexico and our temperature controlled Olympic pool lies Coconut’s Bar & Grill.  Open for breakfast, lunch and sumptuous frozen cocktails each and every delightful day.  Our consummate staff will provide everything you need to relax by the pool or beachside.
Sunset over the Gulf of Mexico heralds in a special time of day where members and guests can be found gathering at Coconuts for pre-dinner cocktails, tropical breezes and the dawn of another magical holiday evening.
Historic Hidden Gem
Serving patrons for over forty years, The Bar at The Thistle Lodge Beachfront Restaurant, has a warm and inviting atmosphere, featuring a full-service bar including a fine selection of Bourbon, Rye, and Single Malt Scotch as well as an exceptional wine list. Open from 11 am – 3 pm and 5 pm – 9 pm daily.
Use the button below to make a Thistle Lodge reservation (recommended).

Enjoy the best of Sanibel Island!
WITHOUT THE NIGHTLY RESORT FEE
Here at Casa Ybel Resort, we have always treasured the private and expansive nature of our beautiful, pristine 23 acres on the Gulf of Mexico.  All of our elegantly appointed Gulf facing suites with balconies feature private entrances and equally private sandy paths to the beach intertwined with beautiful tropical flora.  Here, you and yours can feel that you have the resort to yourselves, a safe and secluded retreat.  All our amenities allow you to enjoy them in the beautiful SW Florida sunshine among the frolic of the surf, wind through the Australian pines and the fun banter of seagulls and sandpipers on the beach.  The best dining and tropical drinks in the area are on property with amply spaced outdoor seating at both our pool side Coconut’s Bar and Grill and the multiple award-winning Thistle Lodge restaurant.  Stop by the Concierge for a bicycle and enjoy the island’s ample bike paths, take an open air trolley ride, or while away the day on a hammock under a coconut palm with a good book or relaxing gulf front in a beach lounge ( We recommend the latter but must insist on adding a frozen daiquiri).    Travel back to simpler times here at Casa Ybel. Our staff eagerly awaits the opportunity to exceed your tropical expectations.
Check in date
Check out date
Book Now
========================== HOVER BOX ==========================
All Gulf View Suites
Casa Ybel is a luxury all suite resort. Each suite directly faces the emerald colored Gulf of Mexico visible from it’s screened patio. Each suite also features a full kitchen. We want you to feel at home at the resort so we have thought of everything. We even offer grocery delivery.
END======================= HOVER BOX ==========================
========================== HOVER BOX ==========================
DISCOVER 360° OF RESORT FUN
Casa Ybel is jam packed with activities for both the fun seeker as well as those that wish to simply soak in the sun. We’re honored to have you as our guest and are ready to custom tailor your vacation to make it amazing.
END======================= HOVER BOX ==========================
========================== HOVER BOX ==========================
SUMPTUOUS CUISINE & COCKTAILS
Casa Ybel’s resort dining options are truly special. From teaming seafood towers featuring the best fresh from the Gulf delicacies to prime steaks and frozen craft cocktails, Casa Ybel has everything your palate has been longing for.
END======================= HOVER BOX ==========================
BOOK YOUR CASA YBEL GETAWAY TODAY!
Offers & Packages
========================== HOVER BOX ==========================
5th Night Free
5th Night Free
The hardest part of visiting Sanibel Island is leaving so we are making it easier for you to stay longer with a reduced rate!
Must arrive Sunday and depart on Friday
.  Available now through September 30th subject to availability and blackout dates.  Certain restrictions may apply, not valid with existing reservations.
END======================= HOVER BOX ==========================
========================== HOVER BOX ==========================
Sanibel Family Vacation
Sanibel Family Vacation
Reserve a spacious two bedroom beachfront suite furnished with all the comforts of home for 7 Nights arriving on Friday to receive a $100 resort credit. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Certain restrictions may apply.
END======================= HOVER BOX ==========================
========================== HOVER BOX ==========================
Florida Residents
Exclusive Rate
Enjoy the perfect island getaway in your own backyard!  Casa Ybel Resort offers savings exclusively for Florida Residents.  Enter your dates to view these special rates.  Not available all year round subject to availability.
END======================= HOVER BOX ==========================

CHERISH
Sanibel Island Weddings
SANIBEL ISLAND WEDDINGS
Whether you envision an intimate beach wedding with the aquamarine waves of the Gulf as your backdrop or a lavish reception under a crisp white tent, the historic Casa Ybel Resort is an unrivaled destination for romantic Sanibel Island weddings. Our 23-acre beachfront resort has been hosting unforgettable island wedding ceremonies and receptions for more than a century and offers a variety of romantic venues, wedding packages and unique enhancements that ensure your special day is the perfect reflection of your personal style.
Casa Ybel Resort’s wedding specialists can assist you with every detail of your wedding including the rehearsal dinner and farewell brunch, Sanibel Island wedding vendors and off-site excursions for your wedding guests. Our award-winning resort is also the perfect setting for your Sanibel Island honeymoon, complete with miles of pristine beachfront, in-suite
spa services
and endless
activities
to enjoy at your leisure. Celebrate your special day with Casa Ybel Resort, and leave with memories that will last a lifetime.
Request more information about Sanibel Island weddings at Casa Ybel Resort, or contact a wedding specialist at 866.748.8958 or locally at 239.472.0693.
